fixes: Resolved an issue causing unexpected behavior in certain edge cases of media device detection.
Addressed a bug where the participant's video feed would freeze during prolonged screen sharing sessions.
features: Introducing dynamic background blur for video feeds, providing a polished and professional look during virtual meetings.
Enhanced network resilience to ensure a smoother experience in low-bandwidth environments.
Added support for customizable meeting themes, allowing users to personalize their meeting environment.

fixes: Fixed a rare issue causing audio distortion in specific network conditions.
Improved the accuracy of participant status updates during high-traffic meetings.
features: Rolling out a new set of emojis for chat reactions, making virtual conversations more expressive.
Introduced an AI-driven noise cancellation feature to enhance audio quality during meetings.
Added real-time language translation for cross-language communication in the meeting chat.

fixes: Addressed an issue causing occasional synchronization errors between audio and video streams.
Resolved a bug leading to intermittent connection drops for participants on slower networks.
features: Launched a virtual background gallery with a variety of professional and fun backgrounds to choose from.
Implemented a participant engagement analytics dashboard for meeting hosts to track audience interactions.
Introduced support for live transcription and closed captions to enhance accessibility.
